DIY skincare: I would create my own skincare products using natural ingredients and essential oils.
Sun protection: I would use natural sunscreens made from ingredients such as zinc oxide and titanium dioxide to protect my skin from the sun.
Makeup-free look: I would embrace a makeup-free look and focus on enhancing my natural features such as my eyes and eyebrows.
Hair care: I would use natural hair care products made from ingredients such as argan oil and shea butter to keep my hair healthy and moisturized.
Self-: I would use self-care techniques such as meditation, yoga, and breathing exercises to maintain my mental well-being.
